The plant features compound leaves with small, oval-shaped leaflets and produces yellow to orange flowers that bloom in spring. It is adapted to survive in dry conditions, with a deep root system that helps it access underground water. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
